data.eml:eml: Checklist of the water mites (Acari: Hydrachnidia) of Turkey: First supplement

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Erman, Orhan, Gülle, Pinar, Özkan, Muhlis, Candoğan, Hülya, Boyaci, Yunus Ömer (2019): Checklist of the water mites (Acari: Hydrachnidia) of Turkey: First supplement. Zootaxa 4686 (3): 376-396, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4686.3.4
